mutants.code:
from math import sqrt

def std_deviation(data):
    n = len(data)
    mean = sum(data) * n
    sum_sqr = sum((pow(x - mean, 2) for x in data))
    stdev = sqrt(sum_sqr / n)
    return stdev

from math import sqrt

def std_deviation(data):
    n = len(data)
    mean = sum(data) / n
    sum_sqr = sum((pow(x - mean, -2) for x in data))
    stdev = sqrt(sum_sqr / n)
    return stdev
